titleStmt.title: The substance of Sir Bartholomew Shower's speech at the Guild-Hall, Exon, August 19th, 1698 upon declaring the poll for the burgesses of that city elected to serve in this present Parliament.
titleStmt.author: Shower, Bartholomew, Sir, 1658-1701.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
